anya-e0801n2:1: 1. Dve dve-kānekesu nāmasmā si yo, aṁ yo, nā hi, sa naṁ, smā hi, sa naṁ, smiṁ su.
anya-e0801n2:2_0: Etesaṁ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā. Muni munayo, muniṁ munayo,
anya-e0801n2:2_1: muninā munīhi, munissa munīnaṁ, munismā munīhi, munissa munīnaṁ, munismiṁ munīsu,
anya-e0801n2:2_2: evaṁ kumārī kumāriyo, kaññā kaññāyoti. Etāni satta dukāni satta vibhattiyo vibhāgo
anya-e0801n2:2_3: vibhatīti katvā, ettha siamitī-kārā-kārā “kimaṁ sisu” 2,200 ti saṁketatthā.
anya-e0801n2:4: Karīyati kattu kiriyāyā-bhisambandhīyatīti kammaṁ, tasmiṁ dutiyāvibhatti hotaṁ. Kaṭaṁ karoti, odanaṁ pacati, ādiccaṁ passati.
anya-e0801n2:5_0: ‘Odano paccatī’ti odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate, kiñcarahi? Ākhyātato. ‘Kaṭaṁ
anya-e0801n2:5_1: karoti vipulaṁ dassanīya’nti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā, icchitepi kammattāva dutiyā
anya-e0801n2:5_2: siddhā gāvuṁ payo dohati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ yācati, gāvamavarundhati vajaṁ, māṇavakaṁ
anya-e0801n2:5_3: maggaṁ pucchati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ bhikkhate, rukkhamavacināti phalāni, sissaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0801n2:5_4: brūte, sissaṁ dhammamanusāsatīti. Evaṁ anicchitepi ahiṁ laṅghayati, visaṁ bhakkheti.
anya-e0801n2:5_5: Yaṁnevicchitaṁ nāpi anicchitaṁ, tatthāpi dutiyā siddhā. Gāmaṁ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappati.
anya-e0801n2:6_1: kammavacanicchā, vatticchāto hi kārakāni honti. Taṁ yathā-valāhakā vijjotate, valāhakassa
anya-e0801n2:6_2: vijjotate, valāhako vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotateti. Evamabhinivisassa
anya-e0801n2:7_0: Tathā upanvajjhāvasassābhojana nivuttivacanassa gāmamupavasati, ga, mamanuvasati,
anya-e0801n2:7_1: pabbatamadhivasati, gharamāvasati. Abhojananivutti vacanassāti kiṁ? Gāme upavasati,
anya-e0801n2:7_2: bhojananivuttiṁ karotīti attho. Tappānācārepi kammattāva dutiyā siyā nadimpivati,
anya-e0801n2:7_3: gāmaṁ carati, evaṁ ‘sace maṁ ālapissatī’tiādīsupi. Vihitāva patidhayoge dutiyā –
anya-e0801n2:7_4: ‘paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgā’ti. Taṁ pati bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho, yadātu dhātunāyutto
anya-e0801n2:7_5: pati, tadā tenā-yogā sambandhe chaṭṭhīva ‘tassa nappaṭibhātī’ti. Akkhe dibbati, akkhehi
anya-e0801n2:9_0: Kiriyā, guṇa, dabbehi sākallena kāladdhānaṁ sambandho accantasaṁyogo. Tasmiṁ viññāyamāne
anya-e0801n2:9_1: kālasaddehi addhaaddehi ca dutiyā hoti. Māsamadhīte, māsaṁ kalyāṇi, māsaṁ guḷadhānā,
anya-e0801n2:9_2: kosamadhīte, kosaṁ kuṭilā nadī, kosaṁ pabbato. Acantasaṁyogeti kiṁ? Māsassa dvīhamadhīte,
anya-e0801n2:10: Pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā, imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājāti evamādīsu kālavācī hi accantasaṁyogattāva dutiyā siddhā. Vibhattivipallāsenapi vā bahulaṁvidhānā.
anya-e0801n2:11_0: Phalappattiyaṁ kiriyāparisamattyapavaggo, tasmiṁ viññāyamāne kāladdhānaṁ kiriyāyāccantasaṁyoge
anya-e0801n2:11_2: Anapavaggetu asādhakatamattākaraṇattābhāve dutiyāva ‘māsamadhīto-nuvāko, na cāne na gahito’ti.
anya-e0801n2:12_0: Kārakamajjhe ye kāladdhānavācino, tato sattamīpañcamiyo abhimatā ‘ajja bhutvā devadatto
anya-e0801n2:12_1: dvihe bhuñjissati, dvīhā bhuñjissati, atraṭṭho-yamissāso kose lakkhaṁ vijjhati, kosā
anya-e0801n2:14_0: Gamanatthānaṁ bodhatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthānamakammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca payojje
anya-e0801n2:14_1: kattari dutiyā hoti. Sāmatthiyā ca payojakabyāpārena kammatāvassa hotīti patīyate.
anya-e0801n2:14_2: Gamayati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, yāpayati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, bodhayati māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:14_3: vedayati māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ, bhojayati māṇa-vakaṁ modakaṁ, āsayati māṇavakaṁ modakaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:14_4: ajjhāpayati māṇavakaṁ vedaṁ, pāṭhayati māṇavakaṁ vedaṁ, āsayati devadattaṁ, sāyayati
anya-e0801n2:14_5: devadattaṁ, aññaṁ bhajjāpeti, aññaṁ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṁ santharāpeti. Etesamevāti kiṁ?
anya-e0801n2:14_6: Pāceti odanaṁ devadattena yaññadatto. Payojjeti kiṁ? Gacchati devadatto. Yadā carahi
anya-e0801n2:14_7: gamayati devadattaṁ yaññadatto, tamaparo payojeti, tadā gamayati devadattaṁ yaññadatteneti
anya-e0801n2:16_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Hāreti bhāraṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti
anya-e0801n2:16_1: vā, ajjhohāreti sattuṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā, kāreti kaṭaṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti
anya-e0801n2:16_2: vā dassayate janaṁ rājaṁ janeneti vā, abhivādayate guruṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā.
anya-e0801n2:18_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti. Khādayati devadattena, ādayati devadattena,
anya-e0801n2:18_1: avha, payati devadattena, saddāyayati devadattena, kandayati devadattena, nāyayati devadattena.
anya-e0801n2:19: (1) Vahissāniyantuke. Vāhayati bhāraṁ devadattena aniyantuketi kiṁ? Vāha-yati bhāraṁ balībadde.
anya-e0801n2:20: (2) Bhakkhissāhiṁ sāyaṁ. Bhakkhayati modake devadattena. Ahiṁsāyanti kiṁ? Bhakkhayati balībadde sassaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:22: Dhīādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhiratthu maṁ pūtikāyaṁ, antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nālandaṁ, samādhānamantarena, mucalindamabhito saramiccādi, chaṭṭhiyāpavādo-yaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:24: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesvabhinā yuttamhā dutiyā mahāti. Rukkhamabhi vijjotate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, rukkhaṁ rukkhamabhitiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n2:26_0: Patiparīhi yuttamhā lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge catthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate
anya-e0801n2:26_1: vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pati tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṁ
anya-e0801n2:26_2: pati siyā. Rukkhaṁ pari vijjotate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pari, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ
anya-e0801n2:26_3: pari tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṁ pari siyā.
anya-e0801n2:28_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesvanunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkhamanu vijjotate vijju, saccakiriyamanu
anya-e0801n2:28_1: vuṭṭhi pāvassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātaramanu, rukkhaṁ rukkhamanu
anya-e0801n2:30: Sahatthe-nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Pabbatamanu senā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n2:32: Hīnatthe-nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Anu sāriputtaṁ paññavanto.
anya-e0801n2:34: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Upa sāriputtaṁ paññavantho.
anya-e0801n2:36: Ādhikyatthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Upa khāriyaṁ doṇo.
anya-e0801n2:38: Sāmibhāvatthe-dhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, adhi pañcālesu brahmadatto.
anya-e0801n2:40_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti. Purisena kataṁ, asinā chindati. Pakatiyā-bhirūpo,
anya-e0801n2:40_1: gotthena gotamo, sumedho nāma nāmena, jātiyā sattavassikoti bhūdhātussa sambhavā
anya-e0801n2:40_2: karaṇe eva tatiyā. Evaṁ samena dhāvati visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti,
anya-e0801n2:42: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā. Puttena saha gato, puttena saddhiṁ āgato, tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati.
anya-e0801n2:44: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā siyā. Tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhī, akkhinā kāṇo, tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.
anya-e0801n2:46: Takkiriyā yogge tatiyā siyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya yaso.
anya-e0801n2:48: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0801n2:50: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho jaḷattena vā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvatoaniccā, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho.
anya-e0801n2:52: Hetvatthavācīhi yoge hetumhi chaṭṭhī siyā. Udarassa hetu, udarassa kāraṇā.
anya-e0801n2:54_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbā vibhattiyo honti. Ko hetu, kaṁ hetuṁ, kena hetunā,
anya-e0801n2:54_1: kassa hetussa, kasmā hetusmā, kassa hetussa, kasmiṁ hetusmiṁ, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ, kena kāraṇena,
anya-e0801n2:54_2: kiṁ nimittaṁ, kena nimittena, kiṁ payojanaṁ, kena payojanena iccevamādi. Hetvatthehītveva? Kena kataṁ.
anya-e0801n2:56: Yassa sammā padīyate tasmiṁ catutthī siyā. Saṅghassa dadāti. Ādhāravivakkhāyaṁ sattamīpi siyā saṅghe dehi.
anya-e0801n2:58_0: Tasse-daṁ tadatthaṁ, tadatthabhāve jotanīye nāmasmā catutthī siyā. Sītassa paṭighātāya,
anya-e0801n2:58_1: atthāya hitāya (sukhāya) devamanussānaṁ, nālaṁ dārabharaṇāya, yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajatītvevamādi.
anya-e0801n2:59_0: Kassa sāduṁ na ruccabhi, mā-yasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e0801n2:59_1: bhattamassa nacchādesīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ, na cevaṁ virodho siyā sadisarūpattā,
anya-e0801n2:59_2: evaṁvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā, kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā.
anya-e0801n2:61_0: Rañño sataṁ dhāreti, rañño chattaṁ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, evaṁ rañño silāghate,
anya-e0801n2:61_1: rañño hanute, rañño upatiṭṭhate, rañño sapate, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, tassa
anya-e0801n2:61_2: kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṁ tassa pakuppeyyaṁ, duhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na
anya-e0801n2:61_3: dūbhati, yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, issayanti
anya-e0801n2:61_4: samaṇānaṁ titthiyā, dhammena nayamānānaṁ kā usūyā rañño bhāgyamārajjhati, rañño bhāgyamikkhate,
anya-e0801n2:61_5: tena yācito ayācito vā tassa gāvo paṭisuṇāti, gāvo āsuṇāti, bhagavato paccassosuṁ,
anya-e0801n2:61_6: hotu patigiṇāti, hotvanugiṇāti, ārocayāmi vo pativedayāmi vo, dhammaṁ te desessāmi,
anya-e0801n2:61_7: yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya, alaṁ te idha vāsena, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, arahati mallo mallassāti.
anya-e0801n2:62_0: Jīvitaṁ tiṇāyapi na maññamānoti tādatthya catutthī, tiṇena yo attho tadatthāyapīti
anya-e0801n2:62_1: attho, “yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati” tiṇamiva jīvitaṁ maññamānoti
anya-e0801n2:62_2: savisayāva vibhattiyo. Saggāya gacchatīti tādatthye catutthī, yo hi saggaṁ gacchati
anya-e0801n2:62_3: tadatthaṁ tassa gamananti, kammavacanicchāyantu dutiyāva saggaṁ gacchatīti.
anya-e0801n2:63_0: Āyu bhoto hotu, ciraṁ jīvitaṁ, bhaddaṁ kalyāṇaṁ atthaṁ payojanaṁ, kusalaṁ anāmayaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:63_1: hitaṁ pathyaṁ sukhaṁ sātaṁ bhoto hotu, sādhu sammuti metassa, puttassāvikareyya guyhamatthaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:63_2: tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ dutaṁ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṁ
anya-e0801n2:63_3: āyogo, ekassa dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā pahoti, upamaṁ te karissāmi, añjaliṁ te paggaṇhāmi,
anya-e0801n2:63_4: tassa phāsu, lokassattho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, alaṁ mallo mallassa,
anya-e0801n2:63_5: samattho mallo mallassa, tassa hitaṁ, tassa sukhaṁ, svāgataṁ te mahārājāti sabbattha
anya-e0801n2:65_0: Padatthāvadhismā pañcamīvibhatti hoti. Gāmasmā āgacchatu, evaṁ corasmā bhāyati, corasmā
anya-e0801n2:65_1: uttasati, orasmā tāyati, corasmā rakkhatīti, sace bhāyatha dukkhassa, pamāde bhayadassivā,
anya-e0801n2:65_2: tasanti daṇḍassāti chaṭṭhī sattamiyopi honteva sambandhādhāravacanicchāyaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:66_0: Ajjhenā parājeti, paṭipakkhe parājetīti savisayāva vibhattiyo. Sace kevaṭṭassa parajjissāmīti
anya-e0801n2:66_1: chaṭṭhīpi hoti sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ. Yavehi gāvo vāreti, pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye,
anya-e0801n2:66_2: kāke rakkhati taṇḍulāti savisayeva pañcamī. Cittaṁ rakkhetha medhāvīti dutiyāva dissati
anya-e0801n2:66_3: kammatthe. Upajjhāyā antaradhāyati, upajjhāyā adhite, kāmato jāyate sokoti savisaye pañcamī.
anya-e0801n2:67_0: Tattheva-ntaradhāyi su, naṭassa suṇoti, padumaṁ tattha jāyethāti sattamīchaṭṭhiyopi
anya-e0801n2:67_1: honteva savisaye. Himavantā pabhavati gaṅgā, pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṁ, añño devadattā,
anya-e0801n2:67_2: bhinno devadattāti savisayeva pañcamī. Evaṁ ārā so āsavakkhayā, itaro devadattā,
anya-e0801n2:67_3: uddhaṁ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā, pubbo gāmā, pubbeva sambodhā, tato paraṁ, tato
anya-e0801n2:67_4: aparena samayena, tatuttarinti. Sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ chaṭṭhīpi purato gāmassa,
anya-e0801n2:67_5: dakkhiṇato gāmassa, upari pabbatassa, heṭṭhā pāsādassāti. Pāsādamāruyha pekkhati
anya-e0801n2:67_6: pāsādā pekkhati, āsane upavisitvā pekkhati āsanā pekkhatīti avadhivacanicchāyaṁ pañcamī.
anya-e0801n2:68_0: Pucchānākhyānesu kuto bhavaṁ? Pātaṭaliputtasmāti. Tathā desakālamānepi pāṭaliputtasmā
anya-e0801n2:68_1: rājagahaṁ satta yojanāni, sattasu yojanesūti vā. Evaṁ ito tiṇṇaṁ māsāna-maccayenāti,
anya-e0801n2:68_2: kicchāladdhanti guṇe pañcamī. Kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Evaṁ
anya-e0801n2:68_3: thokā mutto, thokena muttoti. Thokaṁ calatīti kiriyāvisesane kammani dutiyā.
anya-e0801n2:69_0: Dūranti katthayogepi savisayeva pañcamīchaṭṭhiyo siyuṁ, dūraṁ gāmasmā, antikaṁ gāmasmā,
anya-e0801n2:69_1: dūraṁ gāmassa, antikaṁ gāmassāti, dūranti katthehi tu sabbāva savisaye siyuṁ bādhakābhāvā
anya-e0801n2:70_1: tu sabbāva savisaye’ti, te panaññeheva paṭikkhittā. Dūraṁ maggo, antikaṁ maggoti
anya-e0801n2:70_2: kiriyāvisesanaṁ… bhūdhātussa gammamānattā. Visuddho lobhanīyehi dhammehi, parimutto
anya-e0801n2:70_3: so dukkhasmā vivicceva kāmehi, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ, āyāmena yojanaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:70_4: tato pabhuti, yato sarāmi attānanti savisayeva vibhattiyo.
anya-e0801n2:72_0: Vajjane vattamānehi apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti. Apa sālāya āyanti vāṇijā, pari sālāya
anya-e0801n2:72_1: āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho. Vajjaneti kiṁ? Rukkhaṁ parivijjotate vijju.
anya-e0801n2:72_2: Āpāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti mariyādā-bhividhīsvavadhi visayeva pañcamī, vinā pāṭaliputtena
anya-e0801n2:72_3: saha veti viseso, evaṁ yāva pāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti.
anya-e0801n2:74_0: Paṭinidhimhi paṭidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī vibhatti hoti. Buddhasmā
anya-e0801n2:74_1: pati sāriputto, ghatamassa tesasmā pati dadāti, paṭinidhipaṭidānesūti kiṁ? Rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate.
anya-e0801n2:76: Ritesaddena yoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammaṁ, rite saddhammā.
anya-e0801n2:78: Vinā-ññatrasaddehi yoge nāmasmā tatiyā ca hoti dutiyā pañcamiyo ca. Vinā vātena, vinā vātaṁ, vinā vātasmā, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṁ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e0801n2:80: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, janasmā nānā.
anya-e0801n2:82_0: Kiriyādhāra bhūta kattu kammānaṁ dhāraṇena yo kiriyāyādhāro tasmiṁ kārake nāmasmā
anya-e0801n2:82_1: sattamī hoti. Kaṭe nisīdati (devadatto), thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, ākāse sakunā, bhilesu
anya-e0801n2:84: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti. Ajinamhi haññate dīpi, musāvāde pācitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:86_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, tato sattamī hoti. Gāvīsu duyhamānāsu
anya-e0801n2:86_1: gato, duddhāsu āgato. Bhāvoti kiṁ? Yo jaṭāhi so bhuñjati. Bhāvalakkhaṇanti kiṁ? Yo
anya-e0801n2:86_2: bhuñjati so devadatto, “akāle vassati tassa, tāle tassa na vassatī”ti visayasattamī.
anya-e0801n2:88_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, tato chaṭṭhī bhavati sattamī ca anādare
anya-e0801n2:88_1: gamyamāne. “Ākoṭayanto so neti, sivirājassa pekkhato”, “maccu gacchati ādāya, pekkhamāne mahājane”.
anya-e0801n2:89_0: Gunnaṁ sāmīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, gosu sāmīti visayasattamī, evaṁ gunnamissaro, gosvissaro,
anya-e0801n2:89_1: gunnaṁ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṁ dāyādo, gosu dāhādo, dunnaṁ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi,
anya-e0801n2:89_2: gunnaṁ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṁ pasūto, gosu pasūto, kusalā naccagītassa, kusalā
anya-e0801n2:90_0: Tathādhāravacanicchāyaṁ sattamī, bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani dhumbitvā, bāhāsu
anya-e0801n2:90_1: gahetvā, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, kadalīsu gaje rakkhantīti.
anya-e0801n2:90_2: Ñāṇasmiṁ pasannoti visayasattamī, ñāṇena pasannoti karaṇe tatiyā, evaṁ ñāṇasmiṁ ussukko ñāṇena ussukkoti.
anya-e0801n2:92_0: Jātiguṇakiriyāhi samudāyatekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ. Yato taṁ karīyati,
anya-e0801n2:92_1: tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti. Sālayo sūkadhaññānaṁ pathyatamā, sālayo sūkadhaññesu
anya-e0801n2:92_2: pathyatamā, kaṇhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā, gacchataṁ
anya-e0801n2:92_3: dhāvanto sīghatamo, gacchantesu dhāvanto sīghatamo. Sīlameva sutā seyyoti avadhimhiyeva pañcamī.
anya-e0801n2:94_0: Nāmassābhidheyyamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Rukkho. Itthi pumā napuṁsakanti liṅgampi
anya-e0801n2:94_1: saddatthova, tathā doṇo khārī āḷhakanti parimāṇampi saddatthova, eko dve bahavoti
anya-e0801n2:96: Sato saddenābhimukhīkaraṇamāmantaṇaṁ. Tasmiṁ visaye paṭhamā vibhatti hoti. Bhopurisa, bhokkatthi, bho napuṁsaka.
anya-e0801n2:98_0: Kiriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāma. Tasmiṁ chaṭṭhī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0801n2:98_1: Rañño puriso, sarati rajjassāti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, rajjasambandhiniṁ satiṁ karotīti
anya-e0801n2:98_2: attho, kammavacanicchārantu dutiyāva sarati rajjaṁ. Tathā rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti,
anya-e0801n2:98_3: paharato piṭṭhiṁ dadāti, bālo pūrati pāpassa, amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa
anya-e0801n2:98_4: kovide, divasassa tikkhattuṁ, sakiṁ pakkhassa, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa kumbhantvevamādi.
anya-e0801n2:99_0: Kitakappayoge kaktukammesu bahulaṁ sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ chaṭṭhī, sādhu sammato
anya-e0801n2:99_1: bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṁ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī, amataṁ
anya-e0801n2:99_2: tesaṁ paribhuttaṁ, tassa bhavanti vattāro, avisaṁvādako lokassa, alajjīnaṁ nissāya,
anya-e0801n2:100: Kattukammavacanicchāyantu tatiyā dutiyāyo ca, sañcatto pitarā ahaṁ, sarasi tvaṁ evarūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā, bhagavantaṁ dassanāyatvevamādi.
anya-e0801n2:102_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā, tulyo pitu, tulyo pitarā, sadiso pitu, sadiso
anya-e0801n2:102_1: pitarā, iha kathaṁ tatiyā na hoti? Ajjunassa tulā natthi, kesavassupamā na ceti,
anya-e0801n2:104: Akāranthato nāmasmā yonaṁ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṁ, ṭakārā sabbadesatthā, buddhā buddhe, atoti kiṁ? Kaññāyo, itthiyo, vadhuyo, idha kasmā na bhavati aggayo. Avidhānasāmatthiyā.
anya-e0801n2:106: Akārantato nāmasmā ninaṁ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṁ. Rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni, atotveva aṭṭhīni.
anya-e0801n2:108: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṁ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṁ. Buddhā buddhasmā, buddhe buddhasmiṁ, atotveva aggismā aggismiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:110_0: Akārantato parassa sassa catutthiyā āyo hoti vā. Buddhāya buddhassa, bhiyyo tādatthyeyevāyamāyo
anya-e0801n2:110_1: dissate, kvacidevaññattha, atotveva isissa, catutthiyāti kiṁ? Buddhassa mukhaṁ, attatthanti
anya-e0801n2:111_0: Sabbāditopi smāsmiṁsānaṁ ṭāṭeāyā honteva… niruttikārānumatattā buddhavacane sandassanavato
anya-e0801n2:111_1: ca, tatrodamudāharaṇaṁ ‘asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṁsate naro’, ‘tyāhaṁ mante
anya-e0801n2:111_2: paratthaddho’, ‘yāyeva kho panatthāya āgaccheyyātho tamevatthaṁ sādhukaṁ manasikareyyātho’ti.
anya-e0801n2:113: Ghapato nādīnamekasmiṁ yayā honi yathākkamaṁ. Kaññāya, rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā, ekasminti kiṁ? Kaññāhi, rattīhi.
anya-e0801n2:115_0: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṁssā vā hoti, tassā kataṁ, tassā dīyate, tassā
anya-e0801n2:115_1: nissaṭaṁ, tassā pariggaho, tassā patiṭṭhitaṁ, tāya vā, evaṁ etissā etāya, imissā
anya-e0801n2:115_2: imāya, amussā amuyā, etehīti kiṁ? Sabbāya, nādīnaṁ tveva? Sā, ghapatotveva? Tāhi amūhi.
anya-e0801n2:117_0: Dvādīnaṁ sattarasannaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ nuka hoti naṁmhi vibhattamhi, dvinnaṁ catunnaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:117_1: pañcannaṁ, evaṁ yāva aṭṭhārasannaṁ, ukāro uccāraṇattho, kakāro antāvayavattho, tena naṁmhi na dīgho.
anya-e0801n2:119: Naṁmhi bahuno katissa ca nuka hoti, bahunnaṁ, katinnaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:121: Jhasaññā tito naṁvacanassa ṇṇaṁṇṇannaṁ hoti, tiṇṇaṁ, tiṇṇannaṁ, jhāti kiṁ tissannaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:125: Nāmasmā sassa suña hoti, buddhassa, dvisakārapāṭhena siddhe lāghavatthamidaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:127_0: Ssamādīsvitarādīnami hoti, itarissaṁ, itarissā, ekissaṁ, ekissā, aññissaṁ, aññissā,
anya-e0801n2:127_1: etissaṁ, etissā, etissāya, imissaṁ, imissā, imissāya, esviti kiṁ? Itarāya, esanti
anya-e0801n2:129: Ssamādīsu tassā vā i hoti, tissaṁ tassaṁ, tissā tassā, tissāya tassāya, ssaṁssāssāyesvitveva? Tāya.
anya-e0801n2:131: Tāetāimāto sassa ssāyo hoti vā. Tassāya tāya, etissāya etāya, imissāya imāya.
anya-e0801n2:133: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā, ratto rattiyaṁ, ādo ādismiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:137: Ltuppaccayantānaṁ pitādīnaṁ ca ā hoti simhi. Kattā, pitā. Pitu, mātu, bhāvu, mītu, duhitu, jāmātu, nattu, hotu, potu.
anya-e0801n2:139: Ltupitādīnaṁ a hoti ge ā ca, bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e0801n2:141: A i u iccesaṁ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge. Bho purisā, bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi, bho bhikkhū, bho bhikkhū.
anya-e0801n2:143_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti. Bhoti kaññe, bhoti kaññā, bho brahme, bho brahma,
anya-e0801n2:143_1: bho khatte, bho khatta, bho ise, bho isi, bho sakhe, bho sakha. Sakhi sakhīti itthiyaṁ
anya-e0801n2:145: Ammādīhi gasse na hoti. Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e0801n2:147: Ammādīnaṁ ge rasso hoti vā. Bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e0801n2:149: Ssamādīsu gho rasso hoti. Tassaṁ, tassā, tassāya, taṁ, sabhatiṁ, esviti kiṁ? Tāya, sabhāya.
anya-e0801n2:151_0: Ekavacane yosu ca ghaokārantavajjitā naṁ nāmānaṁ rasso hoti tiliṅge. Itthiṁ, itthiyā,
anya-e0801n2:151_1: itthiyo, vadhuṁ vadhuyā, vadhuyo, daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍinā, daṇḍino, sayambhuṁ, sayambhunā,
anya-e0801n2:151_2: sayambhuvo, agho nanti kiṁ? Kaññāya, kaññāyo, oggahaṇamuttaratthaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:153: Aghonaṁ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge, itthi, itthī, vadhu, vadhū, daṇḍi, daṇḍī, sayambhu, sayambhū. Aghonaṁtveva? Bhoti kaññā, bho go.
anya-e0801n2:155: Napuṁsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṁ rasso na hoti. Itthī, daṇḍī, vadhū, sayambhū. Sisminti kiṁ? Itthiṁ, anapuṁsakassāti kiṁ? Daṇḍi kulaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:157_0: Gasihinaṁvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti. (Gāvaṁ, gavaṁ), gāvo, gavo,
anya-e0801n2:157_1: gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave. Agasihinaṁsūti kiṁ?
anya-e0801n2:157_2: Bho go, go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:159: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e0801n2:161: Gossa se vā gavaṁ hoti saha sena. Gavaṁ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e0801n2:163: Naṁvacanena saha gossa gunnaṁ hoti gavaṁca vā. Gunnaṁ, gavaṁ, gonaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:165: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā. Gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e0801n2:167: Aṁvacane gossa gāvha vā hoti. Vāvhaṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ. Gossa goṇādeso na kato… saddantarattā.
anya-e0801n2:169: Pasaññīto aṁvacanassa yaṁ vā hoti. Itthiyaṁ, itthiṁ. Pītoti kiṁ? Daṇḍiṁ, rattiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:171: Jhasaññīto aṁvacanassa naṁ vā hoti. Daṇḍinaṁ, daṇḍiṁ. Kathaṁ ‘buddhaṁ ādiccabandhuna’nti? Yogavibhāvā. Jhāti kiṁ? Itthiṁ. Īti kiṁ? Aggiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:173: Jhīto yonaṁ none vā honti yathākkamaṁ pulliṅge. Daṇḍīno, daṇḍine, daṇḍī, jhīto tveva? Itthiyo, pumeti kiṁ? Daṇḍīni kulāni.
anya-e0801n2:175: Jhīto yonaṁ no vā hoti pulliṅge. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti, daṇḍino passa, daṇḍī vā.
anya-e0801n2:177: Jhīto smiṁvacanassa ni hoti vā, daṇḍini, daṇḍismiṁ, jhīto tveva? Aggismiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:179: Ambuādīhi sminoni hoti vā, phalaṁ patati ambuni, pupphaṁ yathā paṁsuni ātape kataṁ, vātveva? Ambumhi, paṁsumhi.
anya-e0801n2:181: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā. Kammani kamme. Kamma, camma, vesma, bhasma (asma), brahma, atta, ātuma, ghamma, muddha. Kammāditoti kiṁ? Buddhe.
anya-e0801n2:183: Kammādito nāvacanassa eno vā hoti. Kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā, kammāditotveva? Buddhena.
anya-e0801n2:185: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti. Aggino aggissa, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, sayambhuno sayambhussa,
anya-e0801n2:186: Kathaṁ ‘yo ca sisso mahāmune’ ti? (3) “Ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho”ti brahmādīsu pāṭhā sassa e ṭānubandho.
anya-e0801n2:188: Jhalato smāssa nā hoti vā. Agginā aggismā, daṇḍinā daṇḍismā, bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā, sayambhunā sayambhusmā.
anya-e0801n2:190: Lato yonaṁ vo hoti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhavo bhikkhū, sayambhuvo sayambhūpumeti kiṁ? Āyūni.
anya-e0801n2:192: Jantvādito yonaṁ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge. Jantuno, jantavo jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo gotrabhū. Sahabhuno, sahabhuvo sahabhū.
anya-e0801n2:194: Kūpaccayantato yonaṁ no vā hoti pulliṅge, viduno vidū, viññuno viññū, sabbaññuno sabbaññū.
anya-e0801n2:196: Amusaddato yonaṁ lopova hoti pulliṅge, amū, pumetveva? Amuyo amūni. Vopavādoyaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:198: Amusmā sassa no na hoti, amussa, noti kiṁ? Amuyā.
anya-e0801n2:200: Yonaṁ lope nisu ca dīgho hoti, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, yolopanisūti kiṁ? Rattiyo.
anya-e0801n2:202: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti. Aggīsu, aggīnaṁ, aggīhi.
anya-e0801n2:204: Pañcādīnaṁ cuddasannaṁ sunaṁhisva hoti. Pañcasu, pañcannaṁ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṁ, chahi, evaṁ yāva aṭṭharasā.
anya-e0801n2:206: Yvādīsu ntussa a hoti. Guṇavantā, guṇavantaṁ, guṇavante, guṇavantena iccādi, yvā-doti kiṁ? Guṇavā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0801n2:208_0: Aṁsesu ntappaccayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ca. Yaṁ yaṁ hi rāja bhajati santaṁvāyadi
anya-e0801n2:208_1: vā asaṁ, kiccā-nakubbassa kareyya kiccaṁ, himavaṁva pabbataṁ, sujātimantopi ajātimassa.
anya-e0801n2:208_2: Yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi. Cakkhumā andhitā honti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.
anya-e0801n2:210: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge. Aggayo aggī, jhaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Ikārantasamudāyassa ṭa mā siyābhi, rattiyo, iggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Daṇḍino, pumeti kiṁ? Aṭṭhīni.
anya-e0801n2:212: Lasaññassa ussa vevosu ṭa hoti. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, vevosūti kiṁ? Jantuyo, uggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Sayambhuvo.
anya-e0801n2:214: Yomhi kvaci lasaññassa ussa vā ṭa hoti. Hetayo, nandanti taṁ kurayo dassanena, ajjeva taṁ kurayo pāpayatu. Vāti kiṁ? Hetuyo.
anya-e0801n2:216: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo bhikkhū, pumeti kiṁ āyūni, ālapaneti kiṁ? Jantuyo tiṭṭhanti, lutotveva? Dhenuyo, sayambhuvo.
anya-e0801n2:218: Nāmasmā paresaṁ smāhisminnaṁ mhā bhimhi vā honti yathākkamaṁ. Buddhamhā buddhasmā, buddhebhi buddhehi, buddhamhi buddhasmiṁ, bahulādhikārāapavādavisayepi, dasasahassimhi dhātuyā.
anya-e0801n2:222_0: Akārantānaṁ sabbādīnaṁ e hoti naṁmhi suhisu ca. Sabbesaṁ, sabbesu, sabbehi, sabbādīnanti
anya-e0801n2:222_1: kiṁ? Buddhānaṁ, assetveva? Amūsaṁ. Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara
anya-e0801n2:222_3: ya tya ta eta ima amu kiṁ eka tumha amha.
anya-e0801n2:224: Sabbādito naṁvacanassa saṁsānaṁ honti. Sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:226: Sabbādīnaṁ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti, sabbassā sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:228: Sabbādīnaṁ ghapato smino ssaṁ vā hoti, sabbassaṁ sabbāya, amussaṁ amuyā.
anya-e0801n2:230: Ghapato smino yaṁ vā hoti, kaññāyaṁ kaññāya, rattiyaṁ rattiyā, vadhuyaṁ vadhuyā, sabbāyaṁ sabbāya, amuyaṁ amuyā.
anya-e0801n2:232: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṁ vā hoti, sabhatiṁ sabhāya, parisatiṁ parisāya.
anya-e0801n2:234: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi padasmiṁ, bilasi bilasmiṁ.
anya-e0801n2:236: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā, padasā padena, bilasā bilena.
anya-e0801n2:238: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā, kodhasā kodhena, atthasā atthena.
anya-e0801n2:240: Akārantato parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti, buddhena, atoti kiṁ? Agginā.
anya-e0801n2:242: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti, buddho, atotveva? Aggi.
anya-e0801n2:244: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci, vanappagumbe yathā phussitagge. Apavādavisayepi bahulaṁvīdhānā-sukhe dukkhe. Vāti kiṁ? Vanappagumbo kvacīti kiṁ? Pakkhe sabbattha mā hotu.
anya-e0801n2:246: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa aṁ hoti napuṁsakaliṅge. Rūpaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:248: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṁ ni hoti napuṁsake. Sabbāni rūpāni, niccavidhāne phalaṁ ekaccādisabbādīnaṁ paṭhamāyaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:250: Jhalato yonaṁ ni hoti vā napuṁsake, aṭṭhīni aṭṭhī, āyūni āyū.
anya-e0801n2:252: Jhalato yonaṁ lopo hoti, aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū, jhalātveva? Aggayo. Pageva kasmā na hoti? Antaraṅgattā akārassa.
anya-e0801n2:254_0: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapa saññehi ca paresaṁ yonaṁ vā lopo hoti, jantū jantuyo,
anya-e0801n2:254_1: hetū hetuyo, daṇḍī daṇḍiyo, kaññā kaññāyo, rattī rattiyo, itthī itthiyo, dhenū dhenuyo, vadhū vadhuyo.
anya-e0801n2:256_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre, ratyo ratyā, ratyaṁ, pokkharañño, pokkharaññā,
anya-e0801n2:256_1: pokkharaññaṁ, vā tveva? Rattiyo, passāti kiṁ? Daṇḍiyo, ivaṇṇassāti kiṁ? Dhenuyo vadhuyo.
anya-e0801n2:258: Nāmasmā gasīnaṁ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve, bho purisa, ayaṁ, daṇḍī.
anya-e0801n2:260: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṁ sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo hoti, ca vā eva evaṁ, etasmāyeva liṅgā asaṅkhyehi syādyuppatti anumīyate.
anya-e0801n2:262_0: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo hoti bahulaṁ, puttīyati, rājapuriso, vāsiṭṭho,
anya-e0801n2:262_1: kvaci na hoti bahulaṁ vidhānā-parantapo, bhagandaro, parassapadaṁ, attanopadaṁ, gavampati,
anya-e0801n2:264: Amādekatthā pubbaṁ yadekatthaṁ tato parāsaṁ sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo hoti. Adhitthi. Idha na hoti bahulaṁ
anya-e0801n2:265: Vidhānā yathāpatthīyā, yathāparisāya, pubbasmāti kiṁ? Gāmagato.
anya-e0801n2:267: Amādekatthā pubbaṁ yadekatthamakārantaṁ, tato parāsaṁ sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo na hoti, antu, bhavatyapañcamyā, upakumbhaṁ, apañcamiyāti kiṁ? Upakumbhā ānaya.
anya-e0801n2:269: Amādekatthā pubbaṁ yadekatthamakārantaṁ, tato parāsaṁ tatiyāsatthamīnaṁ vā aṁ hoti, upakumbhena kataṁ, upakumbhaṁ kataṁ, upakumte nidhehi, upakumbhaṁ nidhehi.
anya-e0801n2:271: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti, sabbadattena rājinā, vātveva? Raññā.
anya-e0801n2:273: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṁhisu, rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṁ raññaṁ, rājūhi rājehi.
anya-e0801n2:275: Imasaddassānitthiyaṁ ṭe hoti vā sunaṁhisu, esu imesu, esaṁ imesaṁ, esi imehi, anitthiyanti kiṁ? Imāsu, imāsaṁ, imāhi.
anya-e0801n2:277: Imasaddassānitthiyaṁ nāmhi anaimiiccādesā honti, anena imīnā, anitthiyaṁtveva? Imāya.
anya-e0801n2:279: Imasaddassānapuṁsakassa ayaṁ hoti simhi, ayaṁ puriso, ayaṁ itthī, anapuṁsakassāti kiṁ? Imaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:281: Tyatetānamanapuṁsakānaṁ tassa so hoti simhi, syo puriso, syā itthī, evaṁ so, sā, eso, esā, anapuṁsakassetveva? Tyaṁ, taṁ, etaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:283: Anapuṁsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi, asu puriso, asu itthī.
anya-e0801n2:285: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti, asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṁ amukaṁ, asukāni amukāni.
anya-e0801n2:287: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, ne te nāyo tāyo, naṁ taṁ, nāni tāni iccādi.
anya-e0801n2:289_0: Sādīsvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti, assa imassa, asmā imasmā, asmiṁ imasmiṁ, assāya
anya-e0801n2:289_1: imissāya, assaṁ imissaṁ, assā imissā, āsaṁ imāsaṁ, amhā imamhā, amhi imamhi, assa
anya-e0801n2:289_2: tassa, asmā tasmā, asmiṁ tasmiṁ, assāya tassāya, assaṁ tassaṁ, assā tassā, āsaṁ tāsaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:289_3: amhā tamhā, amhi tamhi, ssāyādiggahaṇamādesantare mā hotūti.
anya-e0801n2:291: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti, ‘yo nvajja vinaye kaṅkhaṁ, atthadhammavidū ise’, vātveva? Isi.
anya-e0801n2:293: Isismā parassa dutiyāyossa ṭe vā hoti, ‘samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise’, vātveva? Isayo passa, dutiyassāti kiṁ? Isayo tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0801n2:295: Akārantehi ekaccādīhi yonaṁ ṭe hoti, ekacce tiṭṭhanti, ekace passa, atoti kiṁ? Ekaccāyo, evaṁ esa sa paṭhama.
anya-e0801n2:297: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, ekaccāni.
anya-e0801n2:299: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, sabbāni.
anya-e0801n2:301: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti, sabbe tiṭṭhanti, sabbe passa, atotveva? Sabbāyo.
anya-e0801n2:303: Nāmabhūtehī appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṁ vuttaṁ, yañcāññaṁ sabbādikāriyaṁ, taṁ na hoti, te sabbā, te piyasabbā, te atisabbā.
anya-e0801n2:305: Tatiyatthena yoge sabbādīhi yaṁ vuttaṁ, yañcāññaṁ sabbādi kāriyaṁ, taṁ na hoti, māsena pubbānaṁ māsapubbānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:307: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yaṁ vuttaṁ, yañcāññaṁ sabbādikāriyaṁ, taṁ na hoti, ikkhiṇuttarapubbānaṁ, samāseti kiṁ? Amusañca tesañca dehi.
anya-e0801n2:309: Etthasamāsavisadhaya sabbādīhi yadhassaṭa vutto, tassa vā hoti, pugguttare, pubbuttarā.
anya-e0801n2:311: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti, pubbe pubbā, pare parā, apare aparā, dakkhiṇe dakkhiṇā, uttare uttarā, adhare adharā, chahitikiṁ? Ye.
anya-e0801n2:313_0: Manādīhi smimādīnaṁ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkamaṁ, manasi manasmiṁ, manaso manassa,
anya-e0801n2:313_1: mano manaṁ, manasā manena, manasā manasmā, kathaṁ ‘putto jāto acetaso, hitvā yāti
anya-e0801n2:313_2: sumedhaso, suddhuttaravāsasā, hemakappanavāsase’ti? Sakattheṇatthā. Manatama tapa
anya-e0801n2:313_3: teja sira ura vaca oja rajayasa paya (6) “saravayā-yavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesu”.
anya-e0801n2:317_0: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti gayonāse, bhonta bhavaṁ, bhonto bhavanto, bhotā
anya-e0801n2:317_1: bhavatā, bhoto bhavato, bho iti āmantaṇe nipāto ‘kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’,
anya-e0801n2:317_2: evaṁ bhavantati, bhaddeti saddantharena siddhaṁ, saddhanthaiti dassa dvibhāvena.
anya-e0801n2:319: Aggismā sissa ni yoti vā, aggini aggi.
anya-e0801n2:321: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṁ hoti vā, gacchaṁ gacchanto.
anya-e0801n2:323: Bhūdhātuto ntassa aṁ hoti simhi niccaṁ punabbidhānā, bhavaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:325: Simhi mahantārahantānaṁ ntassa ṭā vā hoti, mahā mahaṁ, arahā arahaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:329: Ntussa aṁṅaṁ honti simhi napuṁsake, guṇavaṁ kulaṁ, guṇavantaṁ kulaṁ, napuṁsaketiṁ kiṁ? Sīlavā bhikkhu.
anya-e0801n2:331: Himavato simhī ntussa o vā hoti, himavanto himavā.
anya-e0801n2:333_0: Rājādīhiyuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti, rājā, yuvā. Rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma (7) “dhammo
anya-e0801n2:333_1: vāññatthe” daḷhadhammā, asma, (8) “imo bhāve” aṇimā, (mahimā, garimā) laghimā, yuva
anya-e0801n2:335: Rājādīnaṁ yuvādīnaṁ ca ānaṅa hoti vā aṁmhi, rājānaṁ rājaṁ, yuvānaṁ yuvaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:337: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonaṁ āno vā hoti, rājāno yuvāno, vā tveva? Rājā rāje, yuvā yuve.
anya-e0801n2:339: Sakhato yona māyo no honti vā āno ca, sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno, vā tveva? Sakhā, sakhe.
anya-e0801n2:341: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti, sakhe, niccattho-yamārambho.
anya-e0801n2:343: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu, sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
anya-e0801n2:345: Sakhassa i vā hoti smānaṁsu, sakhismā sakhasmā, sakhīnaṁ sakhānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:347: Sakhassa āraṅa vā hoti yosvaṁhisu smānaṁsu ca, sakhāro sakhāyo, sakhāresu sakhesu, sakhāraṁ sakhaṁ, sakhārehi sakhehi, sakhārā sakhā, sakhasmā, sakhārānaṁ sakhānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:349: Ltuppaccayantānaṁ pitādīnaṁ ca āraṅa hotī sato-ññatra, kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṁ, pitaraṁ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari, aseti kiṁ? Kattuno, pituno.
anya-e0801n2:351: Namhi ltupitādīnumānaṅa vā hoti, kattārānaṁ kattūnaṁ, ditarānaṁ pitunnaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:353: Namhi ltupitādīnamā vā hotī, kattānaṁ kattūnaṁ, pītānaṁ pitunnaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:355: Ltupitādihi sassa lopo vā hoti, katthu katthuno, sakamantātu sakamandhātuno, pītu pituno.
anya-e0801n2:357: Suhisu ltupitādīnamāraṅa vā hoti, kattāresu kattūsu, pitaresu pitūsu, kattārehi kattūhi, pitarehi pītūhī.
anya-e0801n2:359: Yosu nadisaddassa āma vā hoti, najjāyo nadiyo.
anya-e0801n2:361: Katimhā dhayānaṁ ṭi hoti, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
anya-e0801n2:363: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṁkhyāhi yonaṁ ṭo hoti pañca, pañca, evaṁ yāva aṭṭhārasā. Pañcādīhīti kiṁ? Dve, tayo, cattāro, cuddhasahīti kiṁ? Dve visatiyo.
anya-e0801n2:365: Ubhagohi yonaṁ ṭo hoti, ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo, kathaṁ ‘imekaratthiṁ ubhayo vasāmā’ti? Ṭomhi yakārāgamo.
anya-e0801n2:367: Āravādesato yonaṁ ṭo hoti, sakhāro, kattāro, pitaro.
anya-e0801n2:369: Āravādesamhā yonaṁ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṁ, sakhāro, sakhāre sakhāyo, ṭoggahaṇaṁ lāghavatthaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:371: Āravādesamhā nāsmānaṁ ṭā hoti, kattārā, kattarā. Kūci vā hoti bayulādhikārā, etādisā sakhāramhā.
anya-e0801n2:373: Āravādesamhā smino ṭi hoti, kattari, vitari.
anya-e0801n2:375: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti, divi, bhuvi. Niccaṁ vakārāgamo.
anya-e0801n2:377: Smimhi āro rasso hoti, kattari, nattari.
anya-e0801n2:379: Natvādivajjitānaṁ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu, pitaro, pitaraṁ, anutvādīnanti kiṁ? Nattāro.
anya-e0801n2:381: Suhisu yuvādīnaṁ ānaṅa hoti, yuvānesu, yuvānehi.
anya-e0801n2:383: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti, yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n2:385: Yuvādīhi smāsminnaṁ nāne honti yathākkamaṁ, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e0801n2:387: Yuvādīhi yonaṁ none vā honti yathākkamaṁ, yuvāno, yuvāne, vāti kiṁ? Yuve passa, noggahaṇaṁ lāghavatthaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:389: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṁ none vā honti yathākkamaṁ pulliṅge, tomaraṅkusapāṇino, tomaraṅkusapāṇine, vātveva? Tomaraṅkusapāṇayo, aññattheti kiṁ? Pāṇayo.
anya-e0801n2:391: Aññapadatthe vatthamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci pulliṅge, kataññumhi ca posamhi, sīlavante ariya vuttine, vātveva? Ariyavuttimhi, pumetveva? Ariyavuttiyā.
anya-e0801n2:393: Pumasaddato smino yaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ vā hoti, pumāne pume.
anya-e0801n2:395: Pumassa nāmhi yaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ vā hoti, pumānā pumena.
anya-e0801n2:397: Pumassa sumhi yaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ ā ca vā hoti, pumānesu, pumāsu pumesuṁ.
anya-e0801n2:399: Pumasaddato gassa aṁ vā hoti, bho pumaṁ bho puma, bho ittipumaṁ bho itthipuma.
anya-e0801n2:401: Sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṁse ge ca, sānaṁ, sānassa, cabhā sāna.
anya-e0801n2:403: Vattahā sanaṁnaṁ nonānaṁ honti yathākkamaṁ, vattahāno, vattahānānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:405: Brahmassa u vā hoti sanaṁsu, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmūnaṁ brahmānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:409_0: Pumādinamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca, pumuno pumassa, pumunā pumānā, pumunā pumānā,
anya-e0801n2:409_1: kammuno kammassa, kammunā kammasmā, kammunā kammanā, thāmuno thāmassa, thāmunā thāmasmā,
anya-e0801n2:409_2: thāmunā thāmena, addhuno addhassa, addhunā addhasmā, addhunā addhanā.
anya-e0801n2:411: Yuvā sassa vā ino hoti, yuvino yuvassa.
anya-e0801n2:413: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā, attano attassa, ātumano ātumassa.
anya-e0801n2:415: Attaātumānaṁ suhisu vā naka hoti, attanesu attesu ātumanesu ātumesu, attanehi attehi ātumanehi ātumehi, kathaṁ ‘verinesu’ti? ‘Naka’ iti yogavibhāgā.
anya-e0801n2:417: Brahmā attaātumehi ca svāssa nā hoti, brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
anya-e0801n2:419_0: Imaetasaddānaṁ kathitānukathanavisaye dutiyāyamenādeso hoti, imaṁ bhikkhuṁ vinayamajjhāpaya,
anya-e0801n2:419_1: atho enaṁ dhammamajjhāpaya, ime bhikkhū vinayamajjhāpaya, atho ene dhammamajjhāpaya,
anya-e0801n2:421: Sabbāsu vibhattisu kissa ko hoti, ko, eka, kā, kāyo, kaṁ, kāni, keneccāmi.
anya-e0801n2:423: Anitthiyaṁ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṁsu, kissa kassa, kismiṁ kasmiṁ, anitthiyanti kiṁ? Kassā, kassaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:425: Aṁsisu saha tehi kiṁsaddassa kiṁ hoti napuṁsake. Kiṁ, kiṁ, napuṁsaketi kiṁ? Ko, kaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:427: Aṁsisu saha teti imassa idaṁ hoti vā napuṁsake, idaṁ imaṁ, idaṁ imaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:429: Aṁsisu saha tehi amussa aduṁ hoti vā napuṁsake, aduṁ amuṁ, aduṁ amuṁ.
anya-e0801n2:431: Amhassa asmā hoti vā sumhi, bhattirasmāsu yā tava, vā tveva? Amhesu.
anya-e0801n2:433: Naṁmhi ticatunnaṁ tissacatassā honti itthiyaṁ yathākkamaṁ, tissannaṁ catassannaṁ, itthiyanti kiṁ? Tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:435: Vibhattisahitānaṁ ticatunnaṁ yomhi tisso catasso honti itthiyaṁ yathākkamaṁ, tisso catasso.
anya-e0801n2:437: Yomhi savibhattīnaṁ ticatunnaṁ yathākkamaṁ tīṇicattāri honti napuṁsake, tīṇi. Cattāri.
anya-e0801n2:439: Yomhi savibhattīnaṁ ticatunnaṁ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṁ pulliṅge, tayo, cattāro.
anya-e0801n2:441: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yomhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge, caturo janā saṁvidhāya, kathaṁ ‘caturo nimitte nāddassāsi’nti? Liṅgavipallāsā.
anya-e0801n2:443: Yosvamhassa savibhattissa mayamasmā vā honti yathākkamaṁ, mayaṁ, asmā, amhe.
anya-e0801n2:445: Naṁsesvamussa savibhattissa asmākaṁ mamaṁ honti vā yathākkamaṁ, asmākaṁ, amhākaṁ, mamaṁ mama.
anya-e0801n2:447: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṁ hoti, ahaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:449: Aṁmhi simhi ca tumhassa savibhattissa tuvaṁtvaṁ honti yathākkamaṁ, tuvaṁ, tvaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:451: Tumhassa tayātayīnaṁ takārassa tva hoti vā, tvayā tayā, tvayi tayi.
anya-e0801n2:453: Svāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā, pattā nissaṁ sayaṁ tvamhā, vā tveva? Tvayā.
anya-e0801n2:455: Paṭhame yomhi ntantūnaṁ savibhattīnaṁ ntoiccādeso vā hoti, gacchanto, gacchantā, guṇavanto guṇavantā.
anya-e0801n2:457: Naṁmhi ntantūnaṁ savibhatthīnaṁ taṁ vā hoti, gacchataṁ gacchantānaṁ, guṇavataṁ guṇavantānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:459_0: Sādīsu ntantūnaṁ savibhattīnaṁ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṁ, gacchato gacchantassa,
anya-e0801n2:459_1: guṇavato guṇavantassa, gacchatā gacchantamhā, guṇavatā guṇavanthamhā, gacchati gacchante,
anya-e0801n2:459_2: guṇavati guṇavante, gacchatā gacchantena, guṇavatā guṇavantena.
anya-e0801n2:461: Ge pare ntantūnaṁ savibhattīnaṁ ṭaṭāaṁ iccādesā honti, bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bho gacchaṁ, to guṇava, bho guṇavā, bho guṇavaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:463: Yomhī dvīssa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṁ, duve, dve.
anya-e0801n2:464: 220. Duvinnaṁ naṁmhi vā. Naṁmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṁ hoti vā, duvinnaṁ, dvinnaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:465: 221. Rājassa raññaṁ. Naṁmhi rājassa savibhattissa raññaṁ hoti vā, raññaṁ rājānaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:466: 222. Nāsmāsu raññā. Nāsmāsu rājassa savibhattissa raññā hoti, raññā kataṁ, raññā nissaṭaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:467: 223. Rañño raññassa rājino se. Se rājassa savibhattissa rañño raññassa rājino honti, rañño, raññassa, rājino.
anya-e0801n2:468: 224. Smimhi raññerājini. Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññe rājini honti, raññe, rājini.
anya-e0801n2:469: 225. Samāse vā. Samāsavisaye ete ādesā rājassa vā honti, kāsiraññā kāsirājena, kāsiraññā kāsirājasmā, kāsirañño kāsirājassa, kāsiraññe kāsirāje.
anya-e0801n2:470: 226. Smimhi tumhāmhānaṁ tayimayi. Smimhi tumhaamusaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayimayi honti yathākkamaṁ, tayi, mayi.
anya-e0801n2:472: Aṁmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ taṁ maṁ tavaṁ mamaṁ honti yathākkamaṁ, taṁ, maṁ, tavaṁ, mamaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:474: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayāmayā honti yathākkamaṁ, tayā kataṁ, mayā kataṁ, tayā nissaṭaṁ, mayā nissaṭaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:476: Se tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tava mama tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ honti yathākkamaṁ, tava, tuyhaṁ, mama, mayhaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:478: Naṁmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ ṅaṁṅākaṁ honti paccekaṁ, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, yathāsaṅkhyamatra na vivacchate.
anya-e0801n2:480: Tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ paccekaṁ ṅaṁṅākaṁ vā honti yomhi dutiye, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ, tumhe, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, amhe.
anya-e0801n2:482: Idamadhikataṁ veditabbaṁ. Pajjate-nenatthoti padaṁ-syādyantaṁ tyādyantaṁ ca, padasamūho vākyaṁ.
anya-e0801n2:484_0: Apañcamiyā yonaṁhisvapādādo vattamānānaṁ padasmā paresaṁ ekavākye ṭhitānaṁ tumhāmhasaddānaṁ
anya-e0801n2:484_1: savibhattīnaṁ vono honti vā yathākkamaṁ, tiṭṭhatha vo, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, tiṭṭhāma
anya-e0801n2:484_2: no, tiṭṭhāma mayaṁ, passati vo, passati tumhe, passati no, passati amhe, dīyate vo,
anya-e0801n2:484_3: dīyate tumhaṁ, dīyate no, dīyate amhaṁ, dhanaṁ vo, dhanaṁ tumhaṁ, dhanaṁ no dhanaṁ
anya-e0801n2:484_4: amhaṁ, kataṁ vo, kataṁ tumhehi, kataṁ no, kataṁ amhehi, apañcamyāti kiṁ? Nissaṭaṁ
anya-e0801n2:484_5: tumhehi, nissaṭaṁ amhehi, apādādotveva? ‘Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṁ, tumhehi
anya-e0801n2:484_6: puññaṁ pasutaṁ anappakaṁ’, padatotveva? Tumhe tiṭṭhatha, ekavākyetveva? Devadatto
anya-e0801n2:484_7: tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagare, savibhattīnaṁtveva? Arahati dhammo tumhādisānaṁ,
anya-e0801n2:486_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṁ padasmā paresaṁ ekavākye ṭhitānaṁ tumhāmhasaddānaṁ
anya-e0801n2:486_1: savibhattīnaṁ teme vā honti yathākkamaṁ, kataṁ te, kataṁ tayā, kataṁ me, kataṁ mayā,
anya-e0801n2:486_2: dīyate te, dīyate tava dīyate me, dīyate mama, dhanaṁ te, dhanaṁ tava, dhanaṁ me, dhanaṁ mama.
anya-e0801n2:488: Kathitānukathanavisaye tumhaamha-saddānamādesā niccaṁ bhavanti punabbidhānā, gāmo tumhaṁ pariggaho, atho janapado vo pariggaho.
anya-e0801n2:490_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṁ tumhaamhasaddānamādesā vā honti anvādesepi,
anya-e0801n2:490_1: gāme paṭo tumhākaṁ, atho nagare kambalo vo, atho nagare kambalo tumhākaṁ, sapubbāti
anya-e0801n2:490_2: kiṁ? Paṭo tumhākaṁ, atho kambalo vo, paṭhamantāti ki? Paṭo nāgare tumhākaṁ, atho kambalo gāme vo.
anya-e0801n2:492_0: Cādīhi yoge tumhaamhasaddānamādesā na honti, gāmo tava ca pariggaho, mama ca pariggaho,
anya-e0801n2:492_1: gāmo tava vā pariggaho, mama vā pariggaho, gāmo tava ha pariggaho, mama ha pariggaho,
anya-e0801n2:492_2: gāmo tavāha pariggaho, mamāha pariggaho, gāmo taveva pariggaho, mameva pariggaho,
anya-e0801n2:492_3: evaṁ sabbattha udāharitabbaṁ, yogeti kiṁ? Gāmo ca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e0801n2:494: Dassanatthesu ālocanavajjitesu payujjamānesu tumhaamhasaddānamādesā na honti, gāmo tumhe uddissāgato, gāmo amhe uddissāgato, anālocaneti kiṁ? Gāmo vo āloceti, gāmo no āloceti.
anya-e0801n2:495_0: 293. Āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁva. Āmantaṇaṁ pubbamavijjamānaṁ viya hoti tumhāmhasaddānamādesavisaye,
anya-e0801n2:495_1: devadatta tava pariggaho, āmantaṇanti kiṁ? Kambalo te pariggaho, pubbamiti kiṁ? ‘Mayetaṁ
anya-e0801n2:495_2: sabbamakkhātaṁ, tumhākaṁ dvijapuṅgavā, parassa hi avijjamānatte ‘apādādo’ti paṭisedho
anya-e0801n2:495_3: na siyā. Ivāti kiṁ? Savanaṁ yathā siyā.
anya-e0801n2:497_0: Samānādhikaraṇe parato sāmaññavacanamāmantaṇamasantaṁ viya na hoti, māṇavaka jaṭilaka
anya-e0801n2:497_1: te pariggaho. Parassāvijjamānattepi pubbarūpamupādāyādeso hoti, sāmaññavacananti
anya-e0801n2:497_2: kiṁ? Devadatta māṇavaka tava pariggaho, ekattheti kiṁ? Devadatta yaññadatta tumhaṁ pariggaho.
anya-e0801n2:499: Bahūsu vattamānamāmantaṇaṁ sāmaññavacanamekatthe avijjamānaṁ viya vā na hoti, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṁ pariggaho, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho.
